bulkpublish.name: BulkPublish
bulkpublish.description: Grants permission to initiate a bulk publish of all existing datasets for an Identity Pool to the configured stream

deletedataset.name: DeleteDataset
deletedataset.description: Grants permission to delete a specific dataset

describedataset.name: DescribeDataset
describedataset.description: Grants permission to get metadata about a dataset by identity and dataset name

describeidentitypoolusage.name: DescribeIdentityPoolUsage
describeidentitypoolusage.description: Grants permission to get usage details (for example, data storage) about a particular identity pool

describeidentityusage.name: DescribeIdentityUsage
describeidentityusage.description: Grants permission to get usage information for an identity, including number of datasets and data usage

getbulkpublishdetails.name: GetBulkPublishDetails
getbulkpublishdetails.description: Grants permission to get the status of the last BulkPublish operation for an identity pool

getcognitoevents.name: GetCognitoEvents
getcognitoevents.description: Grants permission to get the events and the corresponding Lambda functions associated with an identity pool

getidentitypoolconfiguration.name: GetIdentityPoolConfiguration
getidentitypoolconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the configuration settings of an identity pool

listdatasets.name: ListDatasets
listdatasets.description: Grants permission to list datasets for an identity

listidentitypoolusage.name: ListIdentityPoolUsage
listidentitypoolusage.description: Grants permission to get a list of identity pools registered with Cognito

listrecords.name: ListRecords
listrecords.description: Grants permission to get paginated records, optionally changed after a particular sync count for a dataset and identity

registerdevice.name: RegisterDevice
registerdevice.description: Grants permission to register a device to receive push sync notifications

setcognitoevents.name: SetCognitoEvents
setcognitoevents.description: Grants permission to set the AWS Lambda function for a given event type for an identity pool

setidentitypoolconfiguration.name: SetIdentityPoolConfiguration
setidentitypoolconfiguration.description: Grants permission to set the necessary configuration for push sync

subscribetodataset.name: SubscribeToDataset
subscribetodataset.description: Grants permission to subscribe to receive notifications when a dataset is modified by another device

unsubscribefromdataset.name: UnsubscribeFromDataset
unsubscribefromdataset.description: Grants permission to unsubscribe from receiving notifications when a dataset is modified by another device

updaterecords.name: UpdateRecords
updaterecords.description: Grants permission to post updates to records and add and delete records for a dataset and user
